metadata.name: Service Installation with Suspicious Folder Pattern
metadata.comment: Detects service installation with suspicious folder patterns

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(metadata.log_provider) = lower('service control manager') AND metadata.event_code = 7045 AND process.file.path rlike '^\[Cc\]:\\\\\[Pp\]rogram\[Dd\]ata\\\\.\{1,9\}\\.exe' AND process.file.path rlike '^\[Cc\]:\\\\.\{1,9\}\\.exe')

output.summary: Detects service installation with suspicious folder patterns

metadata.objective: False positive: Unknown Reference: Internal Research
